children.description: Anything that can be rendered inside of the list (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the list

columnModifier.description: Sets the number of columns on the description list at various breakpoints

displaySize.description: Sets the display size of the descriptions in the description list.

isAutoColumnWidths.description: Sets the description list to format automatically.

isAutoFit.description: Sets the description list to auto fit.

isCompact.description: Sets the description list to compact styling.

isFillColumns.description: Sets the the default placement of description list groups to fill from top to bottom.

isFluid.description: Sets a horizontal description list to have fluid styling.

isHorizontal.description: Sets the description list component term and description pair to a horizontal layout.

isInlineGrid.description: Modifies the description list display to inline-grid.

orientation.description: Indicates how the menu will align at various breakpoints.

termWidth.description: Sets the description list's term column width.
